Hi Cetin,
            You can find the documentation here
http://webteam.ar=
chive.org/confluence/display/Heritrix/2.0.0
 
This should be good enough to=

With regards to developer documentation very little=
 is available 
as compares to 1.x versions. 
 
-Ankur
